title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
itunes:title: THE BEST OF THE DAN PATRICK SHOW
description:
On the Thursday edition of The Best Of The Dan Patrick Show: Doug Gottlieb and Ryan Hollins filling in for Dan, they discuss the Nets blowing a 17-pt lead in Game 2 of their series against the Celtics. 

NASCAR driver Bubba Wallace joins the guys to talk about his rise to stardom, how he uses social media, and what it takes to win a NASCAR race. 

Doug and Ryan talk about Joel Embiid and his game-winner in Toronto as the Sixers took a commanding 3-0 series lead over the Raptors, as well as a discussion about Sixers' star James Harden.

#DougGottliebShow

 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
